00038 class CBaseMenu {
00039 public:
00040  CBaseMenu(Uint8 dlg_theme);
00041 
00042  // Processes the stuff that the menus have in common
00043  virtual void processCommon();
00044  // Processes the stuff that are specific for the derived menu
00045  virtual void processSpecific() {}
00046  // Process more common stuff, like drawing or reading input of mp_Dialog
00047  virtual void postProcess();
00048 
00049  bool mustClose();
00050 
00051  virtual ~CBaseMenu();

00054  bool m_mustclose;
